title: MicrosoftOffice 2007 Ultimate Fully Working
description:
I HAVE UPLOADED OVER 200GB... I now stop seeding...



ORIGINAL FROM HEARTBUG... I just did the program and organize the steps in a better way... I wont take the credit for the cracks... I put this in MiniNova but got banned for some reason that they dont even know...



Fully working Office 2007 Ultimate, this includes online validation as if it was original product, so you can update. I made a very simple program that takes you step by step throu the process, just read and do the steps according to the program, i recommend using PowerISO, if you dont have it, download it, set the drive, and put the file on that drive, and you can AutoRun. No virus at all, no keygen, just a simple lil program made in VB... Here are the directions if you wish not to use my program.



1    Open Program folder and run Setup.exe

2.   the serial number is       M2QKF-KDQ4R-YHQKD-M4YYK-GPWVD

3.   Copy OGACheckControl.dll from "Cracks/MOVEFROMHERE1" folder to
     C:windowssystem32 and replace the existing file.

4.   Copy MSO.dll "Cracks/MOVEFROMHERE2" to
     C:Program FilesCommon Filesmicrosoft sharedOFFICE12
     and replace the existing file.

5.   Open MS Word 2007 application and it will ask u to acitvate it.
     Choose activation by Phone and enter all zeros '0' for confirmation

6.   Go to
    <a href=" http://www.microsoft.com/genuine/office/whyvalidate.aspx?displaylang=en" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.microsoft.com/genuine/office/whyvalidate.aspx?displaylang=en</a>
     This will check for validation of this product from Microsoft.


Enjoy

-------------------Update on 8/14/09-----------------
I see the problem now. If you have 2 folder such as

Program Files
and
Program Files (x86)

put the mso.dll in both.
by this I mean

C:/Program Files/Common Files/microsoft shared/OFFICE12

and on

C:/Program Files (x86)/Common Files/microsoft shared/OFFICE12

It depends on which directory the computer is accessing the program. Just put in both just in case, it should work.
